title: PODCAST: Why Russia is allegedly anti-fracking
contentencoded: More on the news that NATO is accusing Russia of giving money to anti-fracking environmentalist groups. Plus, Detroit is implementing new pension plans for some of its residents, the implications of which have other states nervous. Also, Minessota will be the next state to offer businesses the option of classifying as b-corporations, a title which allows the equal prioritization of social missions and profit.
teaser: Russia allegedly funds anti-fracking, Detroit's new pensions, and b-corporations
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday June 20, 2014
description: Russia allegedly funds anti-fracking, Detroit's new pensions, and b-corporations
